sentences.en: All the inhabitants of the hill country from Lebanon to Misrephoth - maim, all the Sidonians.
sentences.cn: 6从利巴嫩直到米斯利弗玛音,山地的一切居民, 就是所有的西顿人.

sentences.en: Fixed Sange and Yasha Maim buff icon.
sentences.cn: 改变了散华和夜叉的图标.

sentences.en: If you are not for me then why does this distance maim my life?
sentences.cn: 若你不是属于我的,为何此距离折腾着我?

sentences.en: If you're not for me, then why does this distance maim my life?
sentences.cn: 如果你不是我的她, 这距离又怎会让我生不如死 呢 ?

sentences.en: It is illegal to maim oneself to escape duty.
sentences.cn: 为逃避责任而自残是违法的.

sentences.en: It's extremely dangerous work. Landmines still kill and maim more than 60 Cambodians a month.
sentences.cn: 排雷工作非常危险, 柬埔寨每月仍有逾60人因误触地雷而丧生或残废.

sentences.en: Landmines still kill or maim about 300 people every month.
sentences.cn: 地雷每个月仍造成约300人死伤。

sentences.en: Maim: Tooltip adjusted to match the duration the ability has always had.
sentences.cn: 猫凿击: 技能提示修正.

sentences.en: Senna says he is not out to maim, just disrupt a game.
sentences.cn: 塞纳说他并非为了使人受伤而犯规, 她只是想中断比赛.

sentences.en: They conquered Ijon, Dan, Abel Maim and all the store cities of Naphtali.
sentences.cn: 他们就攻破以云,但, 亚伯玛音,和拿弗他利一切的积货城.

sentences.en: Wuxi Mingxin Bioengineering Co. LTD maim products cover green tea extract ( tea polyphenols, catechin ).
sentences.cn: 无锡明欣生物工程有限公司主要产品为绿茶提取物 ( 茶多酚 、 儿茶素 ).

trans.tran_cn: 使残废, 使不能工作
trans.tran_en: to wound or injure someone very seriously and often permanently

trans.tran_cn: 使受重伤，使残废，残害，伤残
